activities.name: Uber to Airport
activities.location: 611 Carnation Ave to John Wayne Airport (SNA)
activities.notes: Private Uber transfer to the airport

activities.name: Transfer to Promontory
activities.location: 181 John Glenn Dr, Concord to Promontory, Oakville
activities.notes:
Napa Valley Tours and Transportation
Driver: Baltzzar
Phone: 707-999-1087

activities.name: Promontory Springtime Gathering
activities.notes: 4:00 PM Reservation for the Springtime Wine Event at Promontory, a winery known for profound site-expressive Cabernet Sauvignon and dramatic hillside views.

activities.name: Tasting at Momento Mori
activities.notes: Private seated tasting at Momento Mori, a small production winery focusing on expressive Napa Valley wines made with minimal intervention.

activities.name: Transfer
activities.location: Momento Mori to Cook St Helena

activities.name: Lunch Cooks St Helena
activities.notes: Casual lunch at Cook, a neighborhood Italian bistro in downtown St. Helena known for fresh handmade pasta and local ingredients.

activities.name: Get Ready for Dinner
activities.notes: Call cart to take us down

activities.name: Flowering of the Vines: Floral Wines Class
activities.notes: 4:30 PM Class led by Kelli White and Josh Kelly

activities.name: Flowering of the Vines: Dinner
activities.notes: 6:00 PM Reception, 7:00 PM Dinner With Greg and Sara Bernaz

activities.name: Transfer
activities.notes: Private transfer for early morning experience

activities.name: Mascot Dawn Patrol
activities.notes: Vineyard tour and sunrise session at Mascot, showcasing young vine wines from Harlan, Bond, and Promontory heritage.

activities.name: Lunch at Giugni's
activities.notes: Classic St. Helena deli known for overstuffed sandwiches and a relaxed vibe.

activities.name: Tasting at Continuum
activities.notes: Estate tasting with panoramic views at the Mondavi family's Pritchard Hill legacy winery.

activities.name: Dress for Dinner
activities.notes: Get ready and prep for the evening

activities.name: BOND Bike to Care Benefit
activities.notes: 6:30 PM Champagne Reception, Dinner to follow at BOND, a Grand Cru-inspired Napa winery focused on single-vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon.

activities.name: Drive to ZD
activities.location: Corona del Mar to ZD Wines

activities.name: ZD Wines Vineyard View Tasting
activities.notes: 11:00 AM Tasting at ZD Wines, a certified organic estate with a focus on Pinot Noir and Chardonnay with spectacular vineyard views.

activities.name: Lunch at Angèle
activities.notes: 1:00 PM Reservation at Angèle, a French country bistro overlooking the river, offering elevated Napa Valley cuisine.

activities.name: Drive to JSX Concord Terminal
activities.location: Napa to 181 John Glenn Dr, Concord

activities.name: Drive home
activities.location: 19301 Campus Dr, Santa Ana to 611 Carnation, Corona del Mar
